body_html: No, there's no specialized backend in PyTorch that supports it at the moment, so you need to use Python. But we're working on making all kinds of RNNs faster, so it should be getting better over the next few months 😊

body: No, there's no specialized backend in PyTorch that supports it at the moment, so you need to use Python. But we're working on making all kinds of RNNs faster, so it should be getting better over the next few months :blush:
